titleStmt.title: Hymns on the resurrection and on martyrs in two hands

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go
Finalized - This is good to go. In the end, I kept P.Ryl as the principal edition and listed Grassien's reconstruction as 'readings'.
Finalized - This is good to go. In the end, I kept P.Ryl as the principal edition and listed Grassien's reconstruction as 'readings'.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Consult the Grassien 2005 article for readings and commentary. TEXT: at end of r.3 I prefer *high-punctus**filler(extension)*; correct the alt tags in r.5; I prefer [.?]δρομον in r.6; in v. 7 being 7.- [οῦ]; in v.8 accent τέξε; add overstrokes to nomen sacrum in v.9;. META: 74162 no. 1 is the principal edition (3787 will be ‘previous’); dimension are 7 cm x 8 cm; image link is (https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/detail/ManchesterDev~93~3~23136~100273:Liturgical-Fragment?sort=reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number&qvq=w4s:/what%2FChristianity;sort:reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number;lc:ManchesterDev~93~3&mi=35&trs=52); title can be ‘hymns and prayer on the resurrection and on martyrs’

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Consult the Grassien 2005 article for readings and commentary. TEXT: at end of r.3 I prefer *high-punctus**filler(extension)*; correct the alt tags in r.5; I prefer [.?]δρομον in r.6; in v. 7 being 7.- [οῦ]; in v.8 accent τέξε; add overstrokes to nomen sacrum in v.9;. META: 74162 no. 1 is the principal edition (3787 will be ‘previous’); dimension are 7 cm x 8 cm; image link is (https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/detail/ManchesterDev~93~3~23136~100273:Liturgical-Fragment?sort=reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number&qvq=w4s:/what%2FChristianity;sort:reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number;lc:ManchesterDev~93~3&mi=35&trs=52); title can be ‘hymns and prayer on the resurrection and on martyrs’

Submit - Encoded Greek text from P.Ryl.3 468. lin3: on plate don't see a dash, printed in edition. lin6: on plate don't see a middot, printed in edition. lin7: on plate don't see .1, printed in edition. Verso: added $m2, as indicated in introduction.

bibl.title: Problèmes d'édition dans le corpus papyrologique des hymnes chrétiennes.
